update shop_predeposit_cash set add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_status = #{deleteStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, cash_account = #{cashAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_amount = #{cashAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, cash_bank = #{cashBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_pay_status = #{cashPayStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cash_payment = #{cashPayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_sn = #{cashSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_status = #{cashStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cash_user_name = #{cashUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_admin_id = #{cashAdminId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cash_user_id = #{cashUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, cash_subbranch = #{cashSubbranch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cash_relation = #{cashRelation,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cash_poundage = #{cashPoundage,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
,
FROM shop_predeposit_cash WHERE cash_user_id=#{uid} order by add_time desc

SELECT shop_predeposit_cash.id, shop_predeposit_cash.add_time, shop_predeposit_cash.delete_status,shop_predeposit_cash.user_code, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_account, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_amount, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_bank, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_pay_status, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_payment, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_sn, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_status, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_name, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_admin_id, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_admin_info, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_info, a.nickname,c.user_type userType,
uo.user_name as operatorName,shop_predeposit_cash.cash_poundage, (SELECT CASE u.user_type WHEN 1 THEN ( SELECT login_name FROM sys_user_account c WHERE c.uid = u.id and c.account_type=2) WHEN 4 THEN ( SELECT phone FROM user_operator o WHERE o.user_id = u.id ) END AS mobile FROM sys_user u WHERE u.id = shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id ) AS mobile , ( SELECT login_name FROM sys_user_account sa WHERE sa.uid = shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id AND sa.account_type=2 ) AS userMobile
from shop_predeposit_cash left join user_customer a on a.uid = shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id=c.id LEFT JOIN user_operator uo ON shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id=uo.user_id
where shop_predeposit_cash.delete_status=0
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_payment like concat('%',#{pdPayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_pay_status like concat('%',#{pdPayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_status =#{pdStatus}
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_name like concat('%',#{pdRemittanceUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_bank like concat('%',#{pdRemittanceBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.nickname like concat('%',#{pdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(shop_predeposit_cash.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(shop_predeposit_cash.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=0
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=1
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=2
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=3
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=4
order by shop_predeposit_cash.add_time desc

SELECT shop_predeposit_cash.id, shop_predeposit_cash.add_time, shop_predeposit_cash.delete_status, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_account, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_amount, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_bank, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_pay_status, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_payment, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_sn, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_status, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_name, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_admin_id, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_admin_info, shop_predeposit_cash.cash_info, a.nickname,c.user_type userType,d.uid serllerId, uo.user_name as operatorName,shop_predeposit_cash.cash_poundage, (SELECT CASE u.user_type WHEN 1 THEN ( SELECT mobile FROM user_customer c WHERE c.uid = u.id ) WHEN 4 THEN ( SELECT phone FROM user_operator o WHERE o.user_id = u.id ) END AS mobile FROM sys_user u WHERE u.id = shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id ) AS mobile
from shop_predeposit_cash left join user_customer a on a.uid = shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id=c.id LEFT JOIN user_operator uo ON shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id=uo.user_id LEFT JOIN user_seller d ON shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id=d.uid
where shop_predeposit_cash.delete_status=0
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_payment like concat('%',#{pdPayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_pay_status like concat('%',#{pdPayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_status like concat('%',#{pdStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_name like concat('%',#{pdRemittanceUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_bank like concat('%',#{pdRemittanceBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.nickname like concat('%',#{pdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(shop_predeposit_cash.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(shop_predeposit_cash.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
shop_predeposit_cash.user_code = #{userCode}
order by shop_predeposit_cash.add_time desc

SELECT sum(shop_predeposit_cash.cash_amount) allAmount from shop_predeposit_cash left join user_customer a on a.uid = shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id LEFT JOIN sys_user c ON shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id=c.id LEFT JOIN user_operator uo ON shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id=uo.user_id LEFT JOIN user_seller d ON shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_id=d.uid where shop_predeposit_cash.delete_status=0
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_payment like concat('%',#{pdPayment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_pay_status like concat('%',#{pdPayStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_status like concat('%',#{pdStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_user_name like concat('%',#{pdRemittanceUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and shop_predeposit_cash.cash_bank like concat('%',#{pdRemittanceBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.nickname like concat('%',#{pdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(shop_predeposit_cash.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(shop_predeposit_cash.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=0
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=1
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=2
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=3
and shop_predeposit_cash.user_code=4
order by shop_predeposit_cash.add_time desc

select
from shop_predeposit_cash where 1=1
AND cash_user_id = #{vo.cashUserId}
AND user_code = #{vo.userCode}
AND DATE_FORMAT(shop_predeposit_cash.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{vo.beginTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(shop_predeposit_cash.add_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{vo.endTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
order by shop_predeposit_cash.add_time desc
